name: Coin Quest 3D (Pre-Alpha)
description:
This is a simple mockup of a platform game made with Blender 2.79.  Won't work with anything older or newer. So make sure you download Blender 2.79 from blender.org, whether its a Windows, Mac or Linux computer.(You could also try UPBGE, but I didn't test it with it) Also I didn't build a binary only version(Sorry:(

If you have any questions about this game or project, let me know. Right now I'm using it as a stepping stone for bigger, better projects and to maybe create some cool models to swap in for the basic primitives(or prefabs).  So far basic platforming mechanics are in this including pickups,  moving, jumping and simple animations along with audio(music too). Thing missing, score board, timers, and other objectives,  but I intend to add those in the future. I hope you guys get something out of this project or even enjoy it. Thanks

BHGamerStudios
